text: I had a thought about #metoo the other day. I assume that I will be excoriated for this. It's okay. But that's my point actually. If #metoo can get control of that it can be orders of magnitude more effective, more quickly, imho. I look at the restrtaint of #blacklivesmatter with great admiration. If the two causes could cooperate, and if #metoo can adopt some of the peaceful coexistence approach of #blm (as I see it), we can all soar. That's what I hope to see.
